Package com.nrifintech.cms.events

package com.nrifintech.cms.events
  • Class Summary
    Class
    Description
    AddedNewUserEvent
    The `AddedNewUserEvent` class extends the `ApplicationEvent` class and is used to publish an event when a new user is added.
    ApprovedQtyReqEvent
    This class is a custom event that is fired when the approved quantity is requested
    BreakfastStartEvent
    A custom event that is published when breakfast starts.
    CancelledOrderEvent
    A custom event that is published when an order is cancelled.
    DeliveredOrderEvent
    A custom event that is published when an order is delivered.
    ForgotPasswordEvent
    The ForgotPasswordEvent class extends the ApplicationEvent class and is used to send an email to the user who forgot their password
    LunchStartEvent
    > The LunchStartEvent class is a custom event that extends the ApplicationEvent class
    MenuStatusChangeEvent
    This class is a custom event that is fired when the status of a menu changes
    PlacedOrderEvent
    The `PlacedOrderEvent` class is a subclass of the `ApplicationEvent` class
    PromotionalEvent
    The PromotionalEvent class extends the ApplicationEvent class and is used to send promotional emails to a list of recipients.
    UpdateQtyReqEvent
    This class is an event that is published by the InventoryService class when it receives a request to update the quantity of an item in the inventory
    UpdateUserStatusEvent
    The UpdateUserStatusEvent class is a custom event that extends the ApplicationEvent class
    WalletDebitEvent
    This class is an event that is published when a wallet debit is successful
    WalletRechargeEvent
    This class is used to publish an event when a wallet recharge is successful
    WalletRefundEvent
    This class is an event that is published when a wallet refund is successful
